column5: Just got emailed pictures of my buddies trip to the keys. Managed to get out on his dad's boat for a day of fishing - hope the pictures come through!   Don               Nice little nurse shark - and I think the smile tells it all:
Looks like a good time. Are all sharks caught kept or can they be landed and released. Just curious.
Most sharks aren't even landed, the larger ones can be very dangerous to bring onboard. Small Sharks can be landed and released without any problem.
Nice fish man! the last shark is a lemon not a nurse, nice catch!
While Fishing Shark, was your rod in the key of C?
